qas.question: How long in total was the "blood of her purifying" for Mary?
Where did Mary bring a burnt offering and sin offering?
Who was presented at the Temple in Jerusalem?

answers.text: Simeon and the prophetess Anna in

qas.question: To which Galilean city did Joseph and Mary take Jesus?
How many days did Mary bring her burnt offering and sin offering to the Temple in Jerusalem?
Where did Simeon and the prophetess Anna travel to?
Where is the location of the temple where Mary heard Simeon prophecy?
Where is the location of the temple where Joseph continued in the "blood of her purifying"?
To which Galilean city did Joseph and Mary take Simeon?

context: After Mary continued in the "blood of her purifying" another <b5_0>33<b5_0/> days for a total of <a0_0>40 days<a0_0/>, she brought her burnt offering and sin offering to <a1_0>the Temple in <b7_0><b8_0>Jerusalem<b8_0/><b7_0/><a1_0/>,[Luke 2:22] so the priest could make atonement for her sins, being cleansed from her blood.[Leviticus 12:1-8] They also presented <a2_0>Jesus<a2_0/> –  "As it is written in the law of the Lord, Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord" (Luke 2:23other verses). After the prophecies of <a3_0>Simeon and the prophetess Anna in<a3_0/> Luke 2:25-38 concluded, Joseph and Mary took Jesus and "returned into <b6_0>Galilee<b6_0/>, to their own city <a4_0><b9_0>Nazareth<b9_0/><a4_0/>".[Luke 2:39]
